ComicInfo.Title: Stephanie Starr
ComicInfo.Summary:
The great science fiction/fantasy anthology series continues with a litany of stellar comics creators.
1) Creativity Unchained: Friedrich, Marrs (1 page text article)
2) Stephanie Starr: In The Light Of Future Days…: Friedrich, Giordano (20 pages)
3) Earthprobe: All A World Of Dreamers: Warwick, Marrs (11 pages)
4) The Return Of The Fish: Skeates (2 pages)
5) I’ve Got The Power!: Starlin, Milgrom (3 pages)
6) The Visitor…: Starlin, Milgrom (3 pages)
7) Key Club: Workman (8 pages)
8) Reincarnalation: Vosburg (1 page)
*Stephanie Starr was initially intended to be a story for DC. It was radically altered for its appearance here.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-16 10:03:13. [CVDB324466]
ComicInfo.Writer: Mike Friedrich, Mal Warwick, Steve Skeates, Jim Starlin, John Workman, Mike Vosburg
ComicInfo.Penciller: Dick Giordano, Lee Marrs, Steve Skeates, Jim Starlin, John Workman, Mike Vosburg, Dick Giordano, Jim Starlin, John Workman, Lee Marrs, Mike Vosburg, Steve Skeates
ComicInfo.Inker: Dick Giordano, Terry Austin, Lee Marrs, Steve Skeates, Jim Starlin, Al Milgrom, John Workman, Mike Vosburg, Dick Giordano, Jim Starlin, John Workman, Lee Marrs, Mike Vosburg, Steve Skeates
ComicInfo.Letterer: Tom Orzechowski, Lee Marrs, Steve Skeates, John Workman, Mike Vosburg
